Package org.drip.portfolioconstruction.objective

Class ExpectedReturnsTerm

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.portfolioconstruction.core.Block
      • org.drip.portfolioconstruction.optimizer.FormulationTerm
        • org.drip.portfolioconstruction.optimizer.ObjectiveTerm
          • org.drip.portfolioconstruction.objective.ReturnsTerm
            • org.drip.portfolioconstruction.objective.ExpectedReturnsTerm
  • public class ExpectedReturnsTerm
extends ReturnsTerm
    ExpectedReturnsTerm holds the Details of the Portfolio Expected Returns Based Objective Terms. Expected Returns can be Absolute or in relation to a Benchmark.

    • Module = Portfolio Core Module
    • Library = Asset Allocation Analytics Library
    • Project = Portfolio Construction
    • Package = Objective


    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
